thread.title_full: Expendables 4 will reportedly start shooting next year with a 2017 release date - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Expendables 4 will reportedly start shooting next year with a 2017 release date - Movies
text: The next instalment in the action and star-packed Expendables may be going ahead. The project will reportedly start shooting next year, with a 2017 release date. The sequel to The Expendables 3, which starred big action stars Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger and Jason Statham, will reportedly shoot in China in 2016, according to Variety.The website also reports that the budget will be over $100 million. However, no cast or director has been confirmed. Star Jason Statham has previously questioned how much longer the Expendables franchise will go on for, saying that it will survive as long as fans are engaged with characters and storylines."It's not my thing to dream up the ideas and what's in store," he said. "One – do I want to do another one? Two – are people tired of it already? You don't know!"Other stars rumoured to join the franchise include Pierce Brosnan and Hulk Hogan.A television series and all-female spinoff are also in the works.
